title: Unique Things About Champions Other Than Mobility

replies.body:
Lack of mobility. I include this because in this day and age, a lack of mobility is more defining than a surplus.

Pets/traps. Kinda lumping these together, but there is a limited pool of these, and an every one of these is unique.

Terrain creation. Again, limited amount, and they tend to be pretty unique.

Non-movement imparing CC/controlled movement CC - pretty defining, as fears, silences, polymorph, and blinds are all pretty rare.

I'd love to see more directional CC, or some sort of mechanic that makes it so a champion can't change the direction they're walking. Slippery area that causes you to slide all the way across it to the other side based on the direction you were going when you first touched it.

As fun as that sounds, I can only imagine how infuriating it would be when you step on a slippery spot and end up walking straight into the enemy team.

At least charms make you walk slower while taunts so far only work in medium-close range
My problem is that we can only imagine it right now, because it doesn't exist yet  :(

Detonating skill shots (such as Vel'koz, Karma, Lucian)

Irregular path skill shots (Viktor, Diana, Rumble)

Returning skill shots (Gnar, Sivir, Ahri)

I know what the thread says, but long-range mobility is pretty unique (Nocturne, Shen, Twisted Fate, Pantheon, Rek'sai)

Vision control (Nocturne, Graves)
Vision control's always something that has struck a chord for me. I would love to be able to see more champions with vision impairing abilities.

Suppresses are pretty unique at this point, granted it's a channel, but I believe under 5 champions still have it.

Immunity mechanics (Kayle ult, Poppy ult, etc.)

With the way Rito is cracking down on them, silences are becoming more rare.

Blinds are pretty uncommon, probably because they're so ineffective. I mean, look at Lee. Blind and OP for how long now?

> Blinds are pretty uncommon, probably because they're so ineffective. I mean, look at Lee. Blind and OP for how long now?

You won this topic.

Skillshot blockers (Yasuo, Braum)

Revive effects (Sion, Anivia, Zac, Aatrox, Zilean)

CD reducers (Shen, Xin, Zilean, Skarner, Taric... this might not be too unique, there could be others I forgot)

CD resets (Irelia, Katarina, Yi, maybe others)

Ammo abilities (Corki, Teemo, Azir, Akali)

Stacking mechanics (Nasus, Veigar and Sion)
Mana regen auras (used to be unique, now don't exist -- old Soraka, Mana Manipulator)
Abilities gated by HP rather than mana or energy (Vlad, Aatrox, Mundo)
Resource bars which require managing and trigger when full (Gnar, Rumble, Shyvana)
Tethered abilities which "detonate" to provide CC (Karma, Nocturne, Leblanc)
Zone-control abilities which prevent entry or control lane (Ziggs, Morgana, Orianna, Lux, Azir)
Minions who replace your autoattack (Azir)

I'm sure there are more. Azir honestly is one of the more unique designs recently, IMO. Even aside from his mobility.
Personally, one of my favorite things is spells being powered by other people using spells. Maokai's passive and Kass's E. Pretty sure those are the only ones.

Crowd control effects that impact both the caster and the target ({{champion:6}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:157}}) are rare and offer significant counter play and risk if they are channeled. Abilities that crowd control allies ({{champion:429}} and, to a lesser extent, {{champion:412}}) are uncommon and sometimes aggravating, but they certainly make game play more interesting.
Mind control....
Untargetability

There are also certain unique forms of mobility, aka blinks, stuff like Kata, Shaco and Ezreal with a much more powerfull alternative to dashs in terms of the amount of safety granted in terms of speed to move
Lulu literally lulu

Specialized ability combos (next ability's effect changes based on previous spell cast)

more and more, Lack of mobility is a unique thing (but mostly because there is some sort of compensation for it in having a stronger kit aside from that)

DoT effects

Non-linear skillshots.
Point-click cc and aura abilities{{champion:44}}
